SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, ALL_LIST.* FROM (
SELECT SERVER_EQPMN_ID, SERVER_EQPMN_NM, SERVER_EQPMN_IP, SERVER_EQPMN_MNGR, MNGR_EMAIL_ADRES, OPERSYSM_INFO, CPU_INFO, MORY_INFO, HDDISK, ETC_INFO, TO_CHAR(RGSDE, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AS RGSDE, TO_CHAR(FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, 'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss') AS FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, FRST_REGISTER_ID, TO_CHAR(LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, 'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss') AS LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, LAST_UPDUSR_ID FROM COMTNSERVEREQPMNINFO WHERE 1 = 1
AND SERVER_EQPMN_NM LIKE '%'||#{strServerEqpmnNm}||'%'
ORDER BY SERVER_EQPMN_ID ) ALL_LIST ) WHERE RNUM > #{firstIndex} AND RNUM <= #{firstIndex} + #{recordCountPerPage}
SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM COMTNSERVEREQPMNINFO WHERE 1 = 1 AND SERVER_EQPMN_NM LIKE '%'||#{strServerEqpmnNm}||'%'

SELECT SERVER_EQPMN_ID, SERVER_EQPMN_NM, SERVER_EQPMN_IP, SERVER_EQPMN_MNGR, MNGR_EMAIL_ADRES, OPERSYSM_INFO, CPU_INFO, MORY_INFO, HDDISK, ETC_INFO, TO_CHAR(RGSDE, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AS RGSDE, TO_CHAR(FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, 'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss') AS FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, FRST_REGISTER_ID, TO_CHAR(LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, 'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss') AS LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, LAST_UPDUSR_ID FROM COMTNSERVEREQPMNINFO WHERE 1 = 1 AND SERVER_EQPMN_ID = #{serverEqpmnId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMTNSERVEREQPMNINFO (SERVER_EQPMN_ID, SERVER_EQPMN_NM, SERVER_EQPMN_IP, SERVER_EQPMN_MNGR, MNGR_EMAIL_ADRES, OPERSYSM_INFO, CPU_INFO, MORY_INFO, HDDISK, ETC_INFO, RGSDE, FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, FRST_REGISTER_ID, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, LAST_UPDUSR_ID) VALUES (#{serverEqpmnId}, #{serverEqpmnNm}, #{serverEqpmnIp}, #{serverEqpmnMngrNm}, #{mngrEmailAddr}, #{opersysmInfo}, #{cpuInfo}, #{moryInfo}, #{hdDisk}, #{etcInfo}, #{regstYmd}, SYSDATE, #{frstRegisterId}, SYSDATE, #{lastUpdusrId})
mapper.update: UPDATE COMTNSERVEREQPMNINFO SET SERVER_EQPMN_NM = #{serverEqpmnNm}, SERVER_EQPMN_IP = #{serverEqpmnIp}, SERVER_EQPMN_MNGR = #{serverEqpmnMngrNm}, MNGR_EMAIL_ADRES = #{mngrEmailAddr}, OPERSYSM_INFO = #{opersysmInfo}, CPU_INFO = #{cpuInfo}, MORY_INFO = #{moryInfo}, HDDISK = #{hdDisk}, ETC_INFO = #{etcInfo}, RGSDE = #{regstYmd}, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM = SYSDATE, LAST_UPDUSR_ID = #{lastUpdusrId} WHERE SERVER_EQPMN_ID = #{serverEqpmnId}

SELECT SERVER_ID, SERVER_NM, SERVER_KND, (SELECT CD.CODE_NM FROM COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE CD WHERE CD.CODE_ID = 'COM064' AND CD.USE_AT = 'Y' AND SERVER_KND = CD.CODE) AS SERVER_KND_NM, TO_CHAR(RGSDE, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AS RGSDE, TO_CHAR(FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, 'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss') AS FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, FRST_REGISTER_ID, TO_CHAR(LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, 'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss') AS LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, LAST_UPDUSR_ID FROM COMTNSERVERINFO WHERE 1 = 1 AND SERVER_ID = #{serverId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMTNSERVERINFO (SERVER_ID, SERVER_NM, SERVER_KND, RGSDE, FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, FRST_REGISTER_ID, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, LAST_UPDUSR_ID) VALUES (#{serverId}, #{serverNm}, #{serverKnd}, #{regstYmd}, SYSDATE, #{frstRegisterId}, SYSDATE, #{lastUpdusrId})
mapper.update: UPDATE COMTNSERVERINFO SET SERVER_NM = #{serverNm}, SERVER_KND = #{serverKnd}, RGSDE = #{regstYmd}, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM = SYSDATE, LAST_UPDUSR_ID = #{lastUpdusrId} WHERE SERVER_ID = #{serverId}
mapper.select: SELECT A.SERVER_EQPMN_ID AS SERVER_EQPMN_ID, A.SERVER_EQPMN_NM AS SERVER_EQPMN_NM, A.SERVER_EQPMN_IP AS SERVER_EQPMN_IP, A.SERVER_EQPMN_MNGR AS SERVER_EQPMN_MNGR, A.MNGR_EMAIL_ADRES AS MNGR_EMAIL_ADRES, A.OPERSYSM_INFO AS OPERSYSM_INFO, A.CPU_INFO AS CPU_INFO, A.MORY_INFO AS MORY_INFO, A.HDDISK AS HDDISK, A.ETC_INFO AS ETC_INFO, TO_CHAR(RGSDE, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AS RGSDE, TO_CHAR(A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, 'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss') AS FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, A.FRST_REGISTER_ID, TO_CHAR(A.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, 'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss') AS LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, A.LAST_UPDUSR_ID FROM COMTNSERVEREQPMNINFO A, COMTNSERVEREQPMNRELATE B WHERE A.SERVER_EQPMN_ID = B.SERVER_EQPMN_ID AND B.SERVER_ID = #{serverId}
SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM COMTNSERVEREQPMNINFO A, COMTNSERVEREQPMNRELATE B WHERE A.SERVER_EQPMN_ID = B.SERVER_EQPMN_ID AND B.SERVER_ID = #{serverId}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, ALL_LIST.* FROM (
SELECT A.SERVER_EQPMN_ID AS SERVER_EQPMN_ID, A.SERVER_EQPMN_NM AS SERVER_EQPMN_NM, A.SERVER_EQPMN_IP AS SERVER_EQPMN_IP, A.SERVER_EQPMN_MNGR AS SERVER_EQPMN_MNGR, CASE WHEN B.SERVER_EQPMN_ID IS NOT NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS REG_YN FROM COMTNSERVEREQPMNINFO A LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT SERVER_EQPMN_ID, SERVER_ID FROM COMTNSERVEREQPMNRELATE WHERE SERVER_ID = #{serverId}) B ON A.SERVER_EQPMN_ID = B.SERVER_EQPMN_ID ) ALL_LIST ) WHERE RNUM > #{firstIndex} AND RNUM <= #{firstIndex} + #{recordCountPerPage}

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM COMTNSERVEREQPMNINFO A LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT SERVER_EQPMN_ID, SERVER_ID FROM COMTNSERVEREQPMNRELATE WHERE SERVER_ID = #{serverId}) B ON A.SERVER_EQPMN_ID = B.SERVER_EQPMN_ID
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMTNSERVEREQPMNRELATE (SERVER_ID, SERVER_EQPMN_ID, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, LAST_UPDUSR_ID) VALUES (#{serverId}, #{serverEqpmnId}, SYSDATE, #{lastUpdusrId})
